function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient information on SARS-CoV-2 and viral transmissibility","Impact":"Difficulty in quantifying the efficiency of engineering and construction controls","Mitigation":"Continued research and data collection on SARS-CoV-2 and viral transmissibility","Technologies":"Data collection tools, epidemiological studies","People":"Public health researchers, epidemiologists","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Complex interconnected subsystems of engineering and construction controls","Impact":"Increased difficulty in implementing effective control measures","Mitigation":"Integration of interdisciplinary expertise, collaborative approach to design and implementation","Technologies":"Interdisciplinary modeling tools, collaborative software","People":"Engineers, architects, public health experts","Owner":"Engineering firms, architecture firms, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Insufficient guidelines for indoor environments","Impact":"Challenges in implementing effective air disinfection techniques","Mitigation":"Publication of comprehensive guidelines, knowledge sharing among experts","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, disinfection technology","People":"Architects, public health experts","Owner":"Public health organizations, professional associations"}]}
